form.title: Clustering Configuration
form.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one column for clustering
form.kmeansDescription: Partitions data into k clusters by minimizing within-cluster variance
form.somDescription: Neural network that creates a topology-preserving map of the data

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.numberOfClustersHelp: Choose the number of clusters to create (2-20)
parameters.learningRateHelp: Controls how quickly the network adapts (0.001-1.0)

validation.numberBetween2And20: Please enter a number between 2 and 20
validation.valueBetween0001And1: Please enter a value between 0.001 and 1
validation.validDecimalNumber: Please enter a valid decimal number
validation.validLearningRate: Please enter a valid learning rate between 0.001 and 1
validation.numberBetween10And1000: Please enter a number between 10 and 1000

results.title: Clustering Results
results.processingMessage: Please wait while the clustering algorithm is running...
results.noClustersMessage: Configure and run clustering to see results here.

visualization.title: Cluster Visualization
visualization.darkerCells: Darker cells indicate higher distances between neighboring nodes
visualization.dataPointsPerCell: Numbers show data points per cell, colors indicate dominant cluster
visualization.componentPlanesDescription: Show the weight values for each input feature across the grid. Red indicates high values, blue indicates low values.
visualization.uMatrixDescription: Shows distances between neighboring nodes. Darker areas indicate cluster boundaries.
visualization.dataDistributionDescription: Shows how many data points map to each grid cell. Colors indicate the dominant cluster in each cell.

page.title: Clustering Analysis
page.description: Discover patterns and group similar data points using K-means and Self-Organizing Maps
page.noDatasetMessage: Please upload a dataset first to start clustering analysis.
